scripts.release:patch: npm version patch -m "chore(release): %s" && git push --follow-tags && gh release create v$(node -p "require('./package.json').version") --generate-notes
scripts.release:minor: npm version minor -m "chore(release): %s" && git push --follow-tags && gh release create v$(node -p "require('./package.json').version") --generate-notes
scripts.release:major: npm version major -m "chore(release): %s" && git push --follow-tags && gh release create v$(node -p "require('./package.json').version") --generate-notes
scripts.release:beta: npm version prerelease --preid=beta -m "chore(release): %s" && git push --follow-tags && gh release create v$(node -p "require('./package.json').version") --prerelease --generate-notes
